title: Unda 7
description: UNDA 7: Homeopathic remedy for the relief of symptoms associated with difficult urination and incontinence.
cleaned_text: - Directions - Free of UNDA 7: Homeopathic remedy for the relief of symptoms associated with difficult urination and incontinence. UNDA Numbered Compounds are the only complex remedies of their type, formulated with both plants and metals, acting on organotropic and energetic sensitivity levels respectively. Each remedy has its own fingerprint and is combined synergistically based on the integrated principles and theories of anthroposophy, oligotherapy, botany, Traditional Chinese Medicine and homeopathy. Ingredients: each drop contains equal parts of: | | Equisetum 25%. Adults: Take 5 drops three times daily, 20 minutes before or after meals or as recommended by your health practitioner. Caution: If you are pregnant or nursing a baby, seek the advice of a health professional before using this product. If symptoms persist or worsen, consult a health care professional. Keep this and all drugs out of reach of children. In case of accidental ingestion, seek professional assistance or contact a poison control centre. - Choosing a selection results in a full page refresh.
